levels.notes: Tutorial 1: Prove the player's strength, enemy gladiator should lose lots of health, but surrender
levels.tutorialText:
You are Rome's mightiest gladiator!
Fight to earn enough money to gain the Wooden Gladius, and with it, your freedom!

levels.notes: Tutorial 2: Player can't avoid killing this enemy - demonstrates compensation
levels.tutorialText:
But you might want to pull your punches...
If you kill a gladiator their owner will take some money as compensation

levels.notes: Tutorial 3: Whatever happens here, the enemy will surrender and the emperor will have them killed
levels.tutorialText:
Watch out for the Emperor's mood - if he's bored he'll have a surrendering gladiator killed...
And you still have to pay the compensation!

levels.notes: Tutorial 4: Show an enemy surrendering and the battle finishing without losing compensation money
levels.tutorialText:
Keep the vibe alive by switching weapons and mixing up your moves!
EXC shows how exciting a move will be this turn

Targeting an opponent will give you a hint about how much health they have,
how much it will take to get them to surrender, and how much damage they'll do.

levels.notes: Level 1: Simple fight with two basic enemies.
